name: Magnetron (Softdisk)
overview: Puzzle game by John Fedor and published in the 1990 edition of Loadstar #070. This game will make you scream. Ever have the feeling that the world was slipping through your fingers, or that your sand castle was getting too big to manage? Well, step right up to Magnetron for another dose of frustration. This game will test your mind as well as your reflexes, as you scramble to keep the balls from slipping past you and falling outside of their intended bins.
